loss_mechanisms.name: Spacetime Curvature Generation Inefficiency
loss_mechanisms.mechanism: Non-optimal metric tensor generation with excessive curvature energy
loss_mechanisms.recovery_method: Geometric optimization with minimal curvature pathways

loss_mechanisms.name: Bubble Wall Oscillation Damping
loss_mechanisms.mechanism: Energy dissipated through uncontrolled bubble wall oscillations
loss_mechanisms.recovery_method: Active oscillation control with energy recovery

loss_mechanisms.name: Field Transition Energy Loss
loss_mechanisms.mechanism: Inefficient energy transfer during bubble formation/dissolution
loss_mechanisms.recovery_method: Adiabatic field transitions with energy recycling

loss_mechanisms.name: Electromagnetic Coupling Inefficiency
loss_mechanisms.mechanism: Energy lost through unoptimized electromagnetic field coupling

loss_mechanisms.name: Temporal Smearing Energy Waste
loss_mechanisms.mechanism: Excessive energy use due to non-optimal smearing time profiles
loss_mechanisms.recovery_method: Dynamic temporal smearing with T⁻⁴ optimization

loss_mechanisms.name: Fixed Parameter Inefficiency
loss_mechanisms.mechanism: Using fixed parameters instead of adaptive optimization
loss_mechanisms.recovery_method: Real-time parameter optimization with feedback control

loss_mechanisms.name: Uniform Field Distribution Waste
loss_mechanisms.mechanism: Energy wasted on uniform fields where concentrated fields suffice
loss_mechanisms.recovery_method: Adaptive field concentration with gradient optimization

loss_mechanisms.name: Energy Buffering Overhead
loss_mechanisms.mechanism: Excessive energy reserves for safety margins beyond requirements
loss_mechanisms.recovery_method: Intelligent energy buffering with predictive control

loss_mechanisms.name: Sequential Operation Inefficiency
loss_mechanisms.mechanism: Energy losses from sequential rather than parallel field operations
loss_mechanisms.recovery_method: Parallel field operation with synchronized control

loss_mechanisms.name: Quantum Decoherence Energy Loss
loss_mechanisms.mechanism: Energy lost through quantum state decoherence in field generation
loss_mechanisms.recovery_method: Quantum coherence preservation with error correction

loss_mechanisms.name: Vacuum Fluctuation Coupling Loss
loss_mechanisms.mechanism: Energy coupled to vacuum fluctuations beyond useful work

loss_mechanisms.name: Entropy Generation Loss
loss_mechanisms.mechanism: Irreversible entropy generation during field operations
